doc.name: PSNR
doc.description: This actor consumes an IntMatrixToken from each input port, and calculates the Power Signal to Noise Ratio (PSNR) between them. The PSNR is output on the output port as a DoubleToken.
doc.author: Michael Leung, Steve Neuendorffer
doc.port: A distorted version of the input signal.
The calculated PSNR between the two inputs.
